page.title: 14My House
page.content: My house has three bedrooms. Mine has a slope in the corner. We have a very big garden with two fruit trees, an apple and plum. The back garden is 180 ft. long.We used to have chickens but a fox got into the pen and killed them all. we also have a greenhouse for tomatoes. We have a large lounge and a sun lounge at the back which opens onto the garden. Upstairs my bedroom is the smallest. The one next door is a spare room and the largest at the back is where Mum and Dad sleeo. We have an airing cupboard next to the bathroom upstairs. In the kitchen we have a Rayburn on which Mum bakes and cooks our meals. Our house is built of stone with a tiled roof.
